name: The Construct
description:
New character - The Construct! 

RECENT CHANGES:
v1.0.4
- Shift Guard/Strike no longer Cycle in Challenge Mode.

v1.0.3
- Added Challenge Mode (1) to char select.
- Fix Save State not triggering Bunker.
- Power Up now deals more damage and Exhausts.
- Wedding Ring description now saves.
- Changed Challenge 3 (config options).

v1.0.2
- Fix Syphon Strike overdraw soft-locking the game.
- Fix Wedding Ring deleting unplayable cards when trying to play them.

v1.0.1
- Electric Armor now works for 1 turn, doesn't exhaust.
- Shift Strike, Shift Guard now give +1/-1.
- Zapper is now 2(1) cost.
- Critical Hit++ no longer reduces cost.
- Fixed bug with Challenge Mode relics when swapping starter.
- Quick-unlock button no longer appears with max unlocks.


Thanks for playing the Construct! Please let Moocowsgomoo know on Steam, Discord, or GitHub if you have any feedback or bug reports!
